newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Millipore started as hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Millipore started as hold.

text.p: -- Prudential Securities initiated coverage of Millipore Corp with a hold rating, a Prudential source said.
-- Prudential analyst Robert Ottenstein said he likes Millipore as a long-term investment but has some near-term concerns due to the strength of the yen and some recent acquisitions.
-- "Long term, we are very optimistic," he said.
-- sees Millipore earning $2.30 a share in 1997 and $2.75 in 1998.
-- set a 12-month price target of $47 on the stock.
